author: norman
msg: Add new MailboxSessionIdGenerator interface and an implementation which use Random under the hood. This allows to have a distributed id generator if needed. This also fixes the problem with generated MailboxSession ids that returned 0L before. See MAILBOX-149

author: rgass
msg: uncommenting the scratchVg option so the node manager doesn't complain.  Probably should be set if it is used, otherwise it takes some default value.
